meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a loft.
meanings.sent1: The cozy apartment had a loftlike feel with its high ceilings.
meanings.sent2: The spacious room had a loftlike design, perfect for storing extra items.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the loftlike space above the bookshelf and claimed it as her own.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared in the loftlike atmosphere of the art studio.
meanings.sent5: The attic was so loftlike that it felt like a secret hideaway.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a loft.
meanings.sent1: The loftlike room had exposed beams and a ladder leading to a small platform.
meanings.sent2: The loftlike apartment had an open floor plan and large windows.
meanings.sent3: The loftlike bed was so high, it felt like sleeping in the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered freely in the loftlike space of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The loftlike architecture of the building gave it a modern and airy feel.

meanings.definition: Suitable for or resembling a loft in design or layout.
meanings.sent1: The loftlike office space had high ceilings and industrial-style lighting.
meanings.sent2: The loftlike studio apartment made clever use of vertical space.
meanings.sent3: The loftlike storage shelves reached all the way to the ceiling, maximizing space.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight in the loftlike room filled with natural light.
meanings.sent5: The loftlike structure of the building allowed for flexible use of the space.
